Maker in Residence

Prepare a proposal for a project that can be completed in a semester and, if approved, receive funding for up to $500. As a Maker-in-Residence you will need to be in the MakerLab to work on your project minimum 5 hours a week, document your project and be a representative of the MakerLab members. This position is a semester long, and while you are a Maker-in-Residence we will help you connect with experts to help with your project, only thing we are asking is the right to use your documentation and success stories.

Contact the MakerLab
